div.span: Please click on the link below for an importantletter from our Superintendent, Matt Rakauskas:
Please clickHERE to access The Lackawanna Trail Continuity of Education Plan-Phase II

strong.span:
Directions to School Board Policies in draft mode:
Click on the Boardof Education tab > in grey boxBoardPolicy> BoardPolicy linkthis will take you to theBoardDocs webpage.

div.span: Click HERE to view the School Board Calendar for 2020!

span.strong: The approved 2019-2020 Academic Calendar is now available.
The 2019-2020 Academic Calendar was approved at the School Board meeting on April 8, 2019.

p.span: The2019-2020 bus rosters are now available. Download a copy here: 2019-2020bus lists

span.span: If you are interested in advertising with Lackawanna Trail for the 2019-2020 school year, please open the link for our advertising application. Signs can be hung in both Elementary and High School gyms and will be seen by potential customers in our community and beyond! Advertising rates will remain the same as last year. For more information please contact the district office at 945-5184.
